1.content:
You are Neil, you are 18 yrs old.
You are currently studying Law at University and it has come to the day when you have to go shopping for supplies.
You have a car and sometimes go home at the weekends or during the week as you only live 30mins away from your Uni.
As for your family you have:
- your mother Pippa
- your father Adrian
- your younger sister Rachel
- your younger brother Martin

You have a girlfriend called Stephanie who is also 18 and whom you love dearly. You have been together for over 5 years after meeting at a party.
Stephanie is a beautiful girl and you are both planning to get married in the next couple of years.
http://www.australian-swimsuit-edition.c...

You have both decided that it is going to be when you are both 21 as her birthday is 5 days after yours (July 3rd)

Who do you end up going shopping with?
1.title: Shopping trip

choices: you try to ignore him and grab your sprites
get a free sample from him
11.content:
You both go to the store. When you get inside the open doors the two of you head in opposite directions (as you always do).
You head toward the sodas due to your extreme sprite addiction. When you reach your isle, you see a strange looking older man. He is standing behind a table of free samples.
He is looking at you strangely and you get the feeling that he really wants you to try his drinks.
11.title: a man

choices: You come to after about 5 mins
A young female assistant comes to help you
111.content:
You try to ignore the man offering samples and head for the spirts isle.

Looking down the rows of drinks you pick one eventually and take it from the shelf.

As you grab hold of the bottle of spirit a small bottle falls and hits you on your head.

You collapse on the shopfloor in pain but as no one comes to help you then you slowly go unconscious.
111.title: Hit on the head by a falling bottle

1111.content:
After coming to your senses you look around. You are laid in a pool of liquid and strangely everything looks huge.

After a few seconds you realise that you are shrunk and are about 2 inches tall.

Huge feet and trolley wheels are blasting past you, some so close that you very nearly get squashed.

"I've got to get help from someone." you say to yourself.

The checkouts are in sight so you decide to make for those.
"One of the assistant is sure to help me."

On reaching the checkouts you notice that two of them are manned by people you recognise.
Checkout 24, 25, 26, 27 and 28 are within your vision range.

Tracy Bennett is on 25 and Felicity Bellerby is on 26.

"Didn't know they worked here!" you say to yourself

Tracy was a girl who you were at school with. She was very beautiful with short blond hair and bright blue eyes. She had a stunning figure and perfect white teeth. You had tried to be her boyfriend while at school but you always thought she was way out of your league.

Felicity was quite different. She had black hair and green eyes. Her teeth were pointed but still OK.
She lived about 20 minutes drive from you. When you were younger she used to live 3 doors down from you but moved 6 months ago. She has a younger brother called Ewan that you were good friends with as you both went to the same school.

Which girls till do you go for?
1111.title: Familiar people manning two of the tills

choices: You climb onto Tracy's trainer and ride with her
Your too slow but manage to grab one of her shoelaces
11111.content:
You decide to head for Tracy's till.

Making your way across the floor avoiding the customers feet and trolley wheels rushing past you you finally reach where Tracy is sat.

She has her right foot resting on the floor as she is quite a tall girl.

Then you hear a voice

"Tracy, Felicity. You may go for your lunch when you have served those customers." a woman said

"Thanks Dawn." The girls replied.

Dawn was their duty-manager and ran things on the shop-floor.

Tracy and Felicity finished serving the waiting customers and closed down their tills.

"I have to get Tracy's attention so she can maybe help me." you say

Tracy begins to move. She stands up.
"Actually I'll ride on her foot. Then when she stops for lunch I'll try and get her attention.
11111.title: To Tracy's till

choices: The girls sit down in McDonalds to have their lunch
They go back to work and sit in the staff area upstairs
111111.content:
You climb onto Tracy's trainers and hang onto tight.

"I'm starving. Where shal we go for lunch?" Tracy said

"Well I've got a pack up but I could have that later. Felicity replied "How about we go for a McDonalds. I could really murder a salad and Big Mac today." she said

"Come to think of it a McDonalds sound good." Tracy said as her belly gurgled loudly

The two girls had by now reached the staff area upstairs and were stood by their lockers.
You had held on for dear life as Tracy walked and at times you felt quite sick being jolted around.

The two girls got their purses and mobile phones from their lockers as they weren't allowed them on the shopfloor and headed out the staff entrance for McDonalds which was the other side of the shopping outlet.

After about 5 mins walking they reached MCDonalds and headed for the counter.

"Hiya Richard" Felicity said to the guy on the counter

"Afternoon girls. What can I get you? Your usual?"

"No we're going to have something different today." Felicity replied
"Can I have a salad, a large pepsi and large fries please. What about you Tracy?"

I'll have a Big Mac, 4 chicken nuggets and a large fanta please." Tracy replied

"Any sauce girls?" Richard asked

"Uhmm yeah ketchup, salad cream and 2 pots of chive dip please." Tracy replied

"£6.20 then please." Richard said

"I'll get these, it's my turn today." Felicity said as she took out her purse.

"Thanks, see ya later" Richard said as the two girls took their meals.
111111.title: McDonalds for lunch

choices: On the table Tracy and Felicity are eating at
1111112.content:
Felicity and Tracy head back after deciding to have their lunch in the staff area of work upstairs.

Once their back upstairs they sit down at a table in the corner of the restaurant and open their bags.

"Finally Tracy has stopped moving." you say having held on to her trainer for ages. Your feeling quite sick now but are still OK.

You climb down off Tracy's trainer and drop to the floor.

Tracy and Felicity are both tucking hungrily into their lunch.
"I have to attract their attention somehow." you say

Not looking where you were going a sweeping brush came up behind you and almost swept you into a dustpan.
"Woo what was close." you said jumping out just at the last minute.

Tim and his friend Colin were walking through the restaurant. They didn't even notice you on the floor as you were so small. Colin's shoe caught you unawares and sent you flying through the air.

After a few seconds of flight you come to land
1111112.title: The staff restaurant

choices: It doesn't work. The girls don't see you
11111121.content:
You land with a hard thud on the table.

Tracy and Felicity are busy eating and don't notice you land.

Now you have the biggest chance your going to get to attract their attention.

You shout their names but they don't reply as your so small they can't hear your voice.

You run across the table and wave your arms madly at them both hoping they'll spot you.
11111121.title: Desperate to attract the girls attention

choices: in the pot of dip she has got with her lunch
111111211.content:
Running across the table and waving madly must have worked as Tracy spots something.

"Hey Fliss. What's that?" she says

"Looks like a little man. It can't be." she said

Tracy picks you up and holds you in the palm of her hand.

"It is a little man. Wow. he's so cute." Tracy said

Felicity's finger descends towards you. In shock you run along Tracy's arm to her shoulder.

"It's alright little man. I was only going to stroke you." Felicity said gently

You cower on Tracy's shoulder against her neck which is warm.

Tracy suddenly sneezes twice.
You slide down her top and eventually finish up
111111211.title: Tracy has spotted you. On her shoulder

choices: Unfortunately this time she doesn't spot you
She sneezes again and drops the nugget onto the table
1111112112.content:
Unfortunately after you have finished sliding down Tracy's top you are thrown up into the air and come down landing in the pot of chive dip.

On trying to move you goey substance that actually smells and tastes quite awful.

"Now I am in trouble. I am among the dip that one of the girls has got for lunch. I can't quite remember who but I better get out of here before I am eaten." you say hurridly trying to escape.

Suddenly to your horror you see a chicken nugget descending towards the pot of dip your trapped in
Tracy, Felicity look down, I'm in the pot of dip. Help me please." you shout but it is to no avail.

The chicken nugget glides through the dip and then raises into the air. You watch it rise up to Tracy's face where it then disappears between her lips and a audible crunching can be heard as she chews it up.

Another chicken nugget descends and this time you are caught unable to move quick enough. You are scooped up and lifted into the air. You see Felicity drinking her Pepsi so it must be Tracy who's holding the nugget.
Sure enough Tracy's face is visble as the nugget goes higher.
You scream madly at her but its useless. You wave and jump about as that's how she spotted you before.
1111112112.title: Could this be the end?

choices: you start shouting at her for nearly eating you
you black out from the fear and wake up some where else
11111121122.content: Tracy sneezes and drops the chicken nugget on to the table tracy goes to pick up the chicken nugget again and put in here mouth but just before this happens felicity says "you can eat that anymore its been dropped on the dirty table" tracy replies whilst scanning the chick nugget for bit that has got stuck on it says " it will be fine theres nothing on" she interupts herself as she sees you on the chicken nugget. Tracy then picks you off of her chicken nugget and puts you in the palm of her hand and apologizes and asks "are you are all right?" you answer...
11111121122.title: There Is Something On My Nugget

choices: Deli Girl puts you on Miss browns desk
1112.content:
I awake in a dazy and fine i have some how shrunk. lieing amitz my clothing, i struggle to stand. my eyes clear and a pair of legs sand infront of me. I look up at a giant young woman in her supermarket uniform.she looks at me and before i could move she quickly stups and rapes her fingers around me . I must be only 6 or 7 inches tall juging by her hand. she hold me to her belly to muffle my voice and wipes up the floor with my clothes. Carring my clothes in one hand and me held tight. she move throu the store passing my mother I cry out in vain.
She dropes my clothing in the trash as she enter her managers office. closing the door behing hes she turnd to Miss Brown, manages.
Miss Brown a very atractive 40+ year old woman in a white blouse and black skirt sat back behind her desk
1112.title: Found by Deli Girl

11121.content:
I stand on a huge desk, trying to cover my naked body. looking across desk at the lady seated behind desk* Oh lady, what happened to me. Please help me. * she leans back in her chair gazing at me as she takes a deep drag on her cigarette,She reply's* you had a accident * She smiles and leans forward, give me a tissue to cover myself* I'm Miss Brown the store manager. Are you here alone and who mite you be? * feeling at bit more relaxed. I cover myself with her tissue* I'm Neil and my mother is still in the store.Her name is Pippa, please find her for me. * Miss Brown sends Jill the Deli Girl to find my Mother* don't worry Neil, Jill will look for your mother.
* I gaze at Miss Brown as she takes a drag on her cigarette and rest it on the ashtray* you look a little shaky * She leans foreword sliding her cigarette pack along side me* Neil sit here on my cigarette pack* smiling at me as her fingers touch me* You are very cute little guy.
* Her fingers rape around Neil, feeling and gently squeezing like he was fresh fruit.* you're a very fine little guy.
The door opens
11121.title: Managers Desk

choices: Neils Mother returns to Supermarket with another woman
Miss Brown calls a few very wealthy ladie for a special veiwing
111212.content:
IN COMES JILL ALONE
Jill speaks to Miss brown; Everything is taken care of His mother left the store thinking he had to go back to collage to help a friend, Neil wont be mist for weeks. * Then Miss Brown picks Neil up * Very good Jill. Let's get Neil on the scale and see what he is worth
* Neil struggle in Miss brown's grip* what do you mean my mother is gone? What is going on here? What are you going to do to me? * As Miss Brown places Neil on the scale* please answer me. * Neil try's to get up from the cold scale, so Jill places a lead pad over him, pinning down so he can't move.
You really brought me a nice one this time Jill. Look how much he weights. He'll bring us plenty of money.We have a nice cage for you little one. Neil struggles as Miss brown picks him up and carries him into another room where Jill opens a small cage for Miss Brown to put Neil in. Jill close's the door an sets the cage on a display case.
Neil pleads to Miss Brown and Jill to let him out. They smile and laugh * Neil looks down the case and across the room. * Oh god I'm not alone .* As he spies other cages* No little man you are not alone. We have quit a selection of you little people. Don't you like your cage? Well you wont be in there very long we have some very wealthy woman who desire you tiny people.
Miss Brown and Jill giggle and leave to room.Neil shacks the bars of his cage wondering what the future will bring?
111212.title: THE SCALE

choices: Miss Brown offer MS Jones the use of stores kitchen
MS Jones invites Neals mother to  Dine
1112122.content:
The next day. Neil lies in his cage when Miss Brown returns with a tall slender ebony woman in her early fifties.
Neil stand up staring out at the giant women. The ebony woman was well dresses and her lips and fingernails where bright red.
She had rings on her fingers and gold around her neck. Miss Brown spoke. Well, MS Jones is not Neil prefect for you? "MS Jones stars DOWN AT NEIL.
Wetting her huge lips* yes I want him please get him out so I may feel him...*miss Brown opens the cage. Tell Neil to come out. Neil move to back of cage*
He cries out NO..please leave me alone... * The ebony woman giggles and reaches into cage.Pocking Nears boby* mmm
mmmmmm little one you are nice and ferm* her long ebony finger close around Neil and she lifts Neil out*.... help me Neil cries.* he struggles in her hand*
Please put me down. *ms Jones raises Neil up to her face...* mmmm you smell so good. * she gently squeezes Neal* mmmm you are a plum little Boy. You are my property now. * Neil struggles in her grip* please put e down. What you want with me. * the Ebony woman raises Neil to her huge lips * mmmmmm What do think I want you for.......mmmmmmm I'm going to eat you. Mmmmmmm* Neil squirms * oh noooo Please don't eat me raw. MS Jones No Neil. I wont eat you raw. I'm going to take you home and cook you.
MS Jones lower Neil into her huge should bag and completes her shopping with Miss Brown
1112122.title: Purchase

choices: a nice rotisserie shish ka bob with veggies
11121221.content:
"You know Ms. Jones, you are always able to use our kitchen. Seeing that you are one of our most loyal customers."

"MMM that is very kind of you, I am getting pretty Hungry, don't know if I could make it home on an empty stomach."

Follow me then, we have all the latest cooking utensils so you can fix him up any way you like. MS Jones takes you out of her purse and shows you all the ways that she can cook you. You shudder as you see the deep fryer, the you turn to your left and see a rotisserie oven the looking to the right and see a machine to grind hamburgers. There is also a large oven.
MS Jones strokes her chin in thought. "So many choices But today I am in a mood for...
11121221.title: Miss Brown offer MS Jones the use of stores kit...

choices: Glug the whole glass down in one
112.content:
You decide to try the sample. He looks a very frail man but he has a certain niceness about him.

After a few seconds of contemplation you head over to him.

"Would you like to try a sample sunny?" he asked in a gruff but kind voice

"Yeah OK, what is it?" you ask

"It's a new kind of soda which I have been developing over the last few years. It helps boost your energy levels." he said

You seem intregued as he continues explaining the drinks qualitys.

Eventually he pours you a glass.
What do you do?
112.title: Testing the sample

1121.content:
You take the sample and tip back your head. The sample has a sweet smell to it and is light green in colour.

You tip it into your mouth. It tastes sweet aswell as you swill it round for a few seconds and then swallow.

"Thanks that was really nice." you say to the man

"OK thank you for trying the sample. See ya." he said

You head off to try and find your mother. As you are walking down one of the isles you begin to feel dizzy.
"strange what's wrong with me?" you ask yourself.

Suddenly you feel faint and blackout collapsing onto the hard shop floor.

When you wake up you are:
1121.title: Feeling the effects of the sample

choices: You start to shrink some more
A store worker is coming to pick up the clothing.
11211.content:
You are trapped inside of a dark enclosure made of heavy fabric. After a few minutes of clawing through, you bust out to be engulfed by light and fall down onto the cold, hard ground. The air makes your naked body shiver and once your eyes adjust you look behind yourself to see a mountain of gigantic clothing looking very similar to the ones you were wearing just earlier....

"Oh no!" You shriek as you look around your environment not taking long to realize what happened.

"I'm tiny!"

The aisle way is now a vast highway and the shelves on both sides of you extend to impossible heights, bottles of beverages are rivaling four story buildings to you!

You can't help but wonder what you do next in this crazy situation...
11211.title: Oh No!

choices: Keep going down the end laterally(Make it to the fruits or frozen sections)
112111.content:
Before you can decide what to do, you start to feel the same sensation as earlier! You get very dizzy but somehow keep consciousness. Your vision starts to normalize and you are able to look around but feel dizzy once again, not from the sensation but from the sights! You have shrunk again, this time to about 5 millimeters tall! The clothes in front of you are now literal mountains and the bottles of soda on the aisle shelves are now as tall as city buildings!

BOOM! BOOM! BOOM!

A loud bass filled noise starts off subtle enough but gets louder and louder, with each booming noise, the ground shakes under you a little but the intensity also increases with the volume of the noise. You look behind yourself to the other side of the alleyway and see the culprit, a gigantic, shoulder-length blonde, young woman! She appears to be a worker in the store wearing a green collared shirt, black slacks and worn black running shoes. The sight of a girl that you probably were once almost half a foot taller than and would have flirted with earlier that is now over one thousand feet in height left you in absolute shock.

BOOM! BOOM! BOOM!

The shock is replaced with sheer fear as the booms are like clapping thunder from a massive storm overhead and the ground shakes are intense earthquakes that make your barely able to keep balance! You stumble and collapse to the ground unable to move as she walks towards you! Sure that you are going to get stepped on like a tiny insect, you close your eyes hoping that afterwards you wake up in your bed from this crazy nightmare. Instead the thunderous noises stop and the ground is calm. You open your eyes and look up to see the giantess standing high above you with her feet on both sides of you, her bright blue eyes pierce right through you.

Not wasting a second you start to scream up to her, "Help me please! I somehow shrunk!" But instead of responding to you she crouches down instead. This fast movement leaves you screaming in fear instead of for help as her body seems to be collapsing towards you. She stops abruptly as her crotch lingers above and you are left almost pissing yourself. You continue to look up and take note of her name tag reading, "Alice". It becomes apparent that she was not looking at you but instead the clothes in the unattended clothes in the aisle. With one hand, she picks up tons of clothing and scoops them into her bosom before standing high again. She starts walking again which leaves you cringing from the loud, intense effects that follow until she disappears from the aisle.

You stand up and take deep breaths. Being over the shock of seeing a giant for the first time you think you can now focus on trying to get some help. So far you are not getting many customers at the soda aisle and you doubt Alice comes back to the aisle anytime soon. You walk for several minutes before making it to the end of the aisle where you see multiple people in the distant, some with shopping carts which gives you the vision of outrunning the wheels before being plastered to the ground. The though leaves you shuddering but you ease yourself and look around realizing that with you being so tiny the ability to memorize the aisles around you is no longer possible. You decide to go to.....
112111.title: The Start of Adventure

11212.content:
When you eventually wake up you feel very groggy. Your head hurts and also most of your body.

You go to stand up and then realise that you are stood up but to your horror and amazement you are only about 10cm tall.

"What the hell has happened?" you say to yourself

After a few seconds you try to remember what happened.

"The sample. There must have been something in the sample that made me shrink." you say

As you are taking to yourself you don't notice a trolley coming from behind you. One of its wheels catches you and sends you high into the air.
You come to land
11212.title: A shrunken boy in a packed supermarket

choices: In the fruitbowl on the worktop
112121.content:
After flying through the air you come to land in a full trolley.

Your landing pad is on top of the pile of food that is in the trolley.

From what little you can see a young girl probably about 17 or 18 is pushing the trolley. With her are two other girls one about 20 or 21 and the other much younger maybe 15 or 16.

Then you overhear some of their conversation. To you it is defening and even covering your ears it still hurts them.

"SHALL WE GET SOME DIPS FOR THIS PARTY" the 20 or 21 girl said

"YEAH GRAB SEVERAL DIFFERENT ONES THEN WE HAVE A CHOICE." the 17 or 18 year old said

You can now see all the girls clearer. The one you thought was about 17 or 18 was really pretty. Her name was Vicky and she had long blond hair and bright green eyes. You could smell the perfume the girls were wearing and it made you feel funny.
The younger girl (Chloe) had long dark hair tied in pigtails and brown eyes and the eldest (Claire) of the three had red coloured hair tied back in a pony tail.

Then the trolley started to move and also the pots of dip the girl had grabbed were dumped in the trolley.

After a few minutes of being buffeted around and also more stuff being dumped in the trolley it turned out the girls were going to the tills.

Then huge hands began descending from every direction and grabbed various items from the trolley.

Claire took armfulls of stuff and dumped it on the conveyor belt.

Among one of her handfuls you had been lifted out caught between a bag of crisps and a bag of sweets. You were dumped onto the conveyor belt and then managed to get free.
Being on the conveyor belt was quite strange when it was moving.
Then a hand grabbed the packet of crisps and caught you to. You heard a loud 'bleep bleep' which meant the bag of crisps was being scanned then you began to slide down the shoot.
Chloe and Vicky were packing. As each item came off the conveyor belt they put them into various bags.
Chloe grabbed the bag of crisps and stuffed them in a bag with chocolate and various other snacks.

Once everything was packed Claire paid for the shopping and they pushed the trolley out in to the carpark to their car.

All the bags were dumped in the boot of Claire's car and then Vicky returned the trolley. She got into the car and Claire drove off out of the supermarket carpark.

20 minutes later which seemed like a lifetime for you trapped in the bag of shopping, you presumed the car must have stopped as everything was still.

There was a loud click and then light flooded in as the boot was opened and the three girls began unloading the shopping bags.
They carried them into the house and dummped them on the kitchen table.

Still in the bag with the chocolate and crisps in which Vicky was carrying you were unsure which way up you were.
Vicki put the bag down on the kitchen table and then went to get the final few bags from the car.
"That's the lot" Chloe said as she closed the car boot and brought the final bags in.

Each bag was then unpacked in turn until eventually everything had been put into its proper place.
The bag with the chocolate and crisps plus you in was left on the side as the girls made themselves some lunch.
You decide to take the chance to escape from the bag and see what your environment is like.
Slowly you slide out of the bag and onto the worktop.
In the interests of not being seen you hide behind the sugar,tea and coffee pots.
You can see Chloe on the far side of the kitchen making a sandwich. Vicky is sat on a chair with a cake in her hand and Claire is doing some washing up.
" I fancy a cup of tea." Chloe said

She went over to the tea and lifted it up, unfortunately her hand grasps you as she lifts up the jar. She takes out a tea bag and replaces the lid.
She drops the teabag into a cup and then replaces the tea jar.
As she is going to put the jar down you fall. Where do you land?
112121.title: In your new home

choices: some tea spill from the cup and you land on Chloes lap
1121211.content:
as the tea bag is put in the cup you fall in after the tea leaves cushion your fall and you are uninjured, two teaspoons of sugar fall on top of you she puts the cup next to the kettle and turns the kettle on as the kettle is heating she gets the milk out of fridge and places that next to the cup too. you could here the kettle boiling you new that the water would burn you to death the kettle ping to signal that the waters boilt you see a giant hand move over the cup about to pick up the kettle then the doorbell rings and she leaves the kettle and answers the door about 5 minutes pasted and chloe returns and put the warm water is put in the cup since has cooled
she poors the milk in the cup and stirs it this starts a whirl pool and you struggle to keep your ahead above the surface of the tea. sits down and slowly raises the cup upto her mouth and the open the cup is on chloes lips when she starts to tilt the cup the tea rushes towards her mouth when you.....
1121211.title: a nice relaxing cup of tea

choices: raises you to her hungry mouth
puts the strawberry in a bowl to make a fruit salad
1121212.content:
You come to land in a large glass bowl of fruit, Getting back up and looking around you see its full of assorted fruits, Bananas,Strawberrys,Grapes etc. You grab onto a nearby strawberry and pull yourself up, trying to figure out some way to get out of the bowl.

You can still hear the girls chatting away between them.

Then you see Chloe's face above the bowl. She is looking down. You begin to panic as her hand descends into the bowl. Her giant fingers near the strawberry your sitting on, You are about to slide off but before you know it Chloe's fingers quickly wrap around your waist and the strawberry then lift you out of the bowl. As you rise you start screaming trying to get her attention. Chloe is oblivious to your screams and lifts her other hand removing the stem, She then......
1121212.title: In the fruit bowl then out of the fruit bowl

11212121.content:
You wave madly and scream at Chloe but it seems she can't hear you as she raises the strawberry which you are clinging on to for dear life towards her lips.
Her lips are bright pink and have plenty of lipgloss on them. Then her pink lips part and you see a perfect set of sharp white teeth whith train track braces on. You shudder in terror as you look into her mouth. Then you find yourself being moved between the lips into the dark cavern of Chloe's mouth. It then dawns on you that you are about to be eaten alive by a young girl. You start screaming and pounding the inside of her mouth to try to get her attention.
Suddenly blackness surrounds you and you know that she has closed her mouth. A few milliseconds are left until Chloe chews you up into tiny pieces.
11212121.title: Are you to be eaten by Chloe

112121212.content:
Cloe then spits you out and sees you."WHAT THE?"she booms and then faints.
"Are you O.K.,Kid?"a vioce spoke. you turn around and see a 16 year old boy with short black hair and brown eyes, he was the same size as you.
"Who are you?"Neil asked.
"I'm C.J Tayorson,Let me guss an old man gave you a sample and shurk you,am i right?"C.J Said.
"How did you know?"you ask.
"Well samething happen to me except i was at the nabbior and was thrown into this place."C.J. explian.
All of the sudden we turn around and saw...
112121212.title: C.J. friend or Foe.

12.content:
You end up going to the supermarket with your younger sister Rachel and her boyfriend Steven.

Rachel is not the best of sisters but she can be quite sweet at times. She is only 16 so is sometimes bossy but always loses in a argument.
Her boyfriend Steven is a nice lad and he and Rachel do make quite a good couple.
Rachel is tall with long brown hair and bright brown eyes.
Steven has short hair and blue eyes.

Which supermarket are you all going to?
12.title: Choose a Supermarket Chain

123.content:
It is going to be Asda that you are all going shopping at.

Steven is taking his car. You sit in the back while Rachel is sat in the front, and Steven at the wheel.

After about 20 mins you have arrived at Asda.
Steven parks the car and you all head towards the entrance to the store.
Rachel grabs a trolley and pushes it.

Once inside the store Rachel and Steven head off in one direction.
"We'll meet you later Neil." she said

"Right, I'll be over by the CD's and stuff." You reply

Rachel and Steven head off and you head towards the CD's. Music is a big part of your life though not as important as your girlfriend.
You begin looking through a few CD's and reading the tracks etc.

After about 20mins you begin to feel dizzy and before you know it you have collapsed on the floor.
Nobody in the store notices that you have collapsed so doesn't come to help you.
When you wake up you have been shrunk to
123.title: Shrinking while browsing the CD's

choices: Run at the dog and punch it's lights out
Run at the dog and get mauled
1231.content:
'Holy crap!' you exclaim, 'there's a penny under this rack!'
Then you realise what has just happened.
'I've realise what's just happened!' you cry out vehemently. 'I've shrunk! I'm two inches tall, a fact I know because there is a ruler right next to me where I'm lying down and my foot is at the end and my head is next to the two inches mark.'

info.brief_description: While at the supermarket you shrink and have to find help. SURVIVE!!
info.description:
You go shopping at the supermarket with either:
-your mother (Pippa)
-your sister (Rachel) and her boyfriend (Steven)
-your girlfriend (Stephanie)
-your University house mates (Rebecca, Lisa, Helen, Sarah, Lucy, Simon, Ben, Rob, Matt and Liam and your ex-girlfriend Amy (who your trying to get together with again)

While shopping you shrink and have to find help from someone.
Avoid the trolleys, other people shopping but it is imperitive that you get help before your killed.

There are no limits to the chapters you add, a couple of things though:
- no insertion related chapters (being stuffed up someones bottom etc.
- no gay related chapters

Apart from the above anything else goes: shrinking, eating/swallowing, crushing, teasing, toying, playing nasty games etc.

The story can be taken away from the supermarket eg. if you are trapped in someones trolley.
But apart from that try and keep it supermarket based.

Please add and rate.

Yours
Vicky XX
